metadata.title: CVE-2022-29918 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Mozilla developers Gabriele Svelto, Randell Jesup and the Mozilla FuzzingTeam reported memory safety bugs present in Firefox 99. Some of these bugsshowed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effortsome of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 100.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
